thread.title: Twitter will reportedly soon allow tweets longer than 140 characters
thread.title_full: Twitter will reportedly soon allow tweets longer than 140 characters - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Twitter will reportedly soon allow tweets longer than 140 characters
text: Twitter is working on a new format that will allow tweets of longer than 140 characters. The company is responding to many users who felt constrained by the length limit, says a new report from Re/code, citing multiple people familiar with the company’s plans. At the same time, the character limits has been a defining trait of […] »
